Metadata.Title: RHSA-2018:3059: X.org X11 security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Low)
Metadata.Description:
X.Org is an open-source implementation of the X Window System. It provides the basic low-level functionality that full-fledged graphical user interfaces are designed upon.

Security Fix(es):

* libxcursor: 1-byte heap-based overflow in _XcursorThemeInherits function in library.c (CVE-2015-9262)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Criterions.Comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
